channel.title: Happy Gilmore
channel.description:
LOOL, ok[i][u] i know im very late[/u][/i] on this but i just watched the movie for the very first time. I absolutely loved it. It was so funny and such a good story line.
When watching it I fell on the floor laughing about 20 times. My favorite part was when He found the alligator with the one eyeball and wrestled it and took the golf ball and killed it rofl. Then at the end the prick guy lost and happy got his gold jacket and the house. Also a pirty lady :D 10/10 for a rating. I love adam sandler, he is hilarious. You guys should definitely check it out.

Dead Alive (1992)

Directed by Peter Jackson. With Timothy Balme, Diana Peñalver, Elizabeth Moody, Ian Watkin. A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses,...

item.title: Happy Gilmore
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I think 10/10 is a little high I’d probably go for 7/10 possibly 8, but it’s a pretty funny film. If you’re into comedy films you should check out our house (used to be called Duplex) it’s hilarious.

IMDb

Duplex (2003)

Directed by Danny DeVito. With Ben Stiller, Drew Barrymore, Eileen Essell, Harvey Fierstein. A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute...

item.title: Happy Gilmore
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

His last good funny movie was happy gilmore. Billy madison was “ok” but all the new ones really suck. I liked his acting in the longest yard, he should have gone that route.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Gilmore
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I find him average at best. He’s usually incapable of playing anything other than his usual role and there’s very little depth to his character. I think 10/10 is going a bit far, when you compare it to other comedies out there.

Read full topic
